@CaulfieldTim @WilliamShatner @LeighannLord @TheSGEM @jonathanstea @DeNovo_Fatima @ScienceUpFirst @KrishanaSankar @crackedscience @PaulFidalgo Please. Kirk would back hand you and then steal your woman for being a beta cuck scoundrel. https://t.co/RXplPdjUjf

@OttawaHealth @CaulfieldTim @WilliamShatner @LeighannLord @jonathanstea @DeNovo_Fatima @ScienceUpFirst @KrishanaSankar @crackedscience @PaulFidalgo @NightShiftMD I have a talk on how @StarTrek is evidence based medicine:
- Mr. Spock is the about the evidence & logical arguments
- Dr. McCoy represents patient values/preferences 
- Capt Kirk uses his good judgment to integrate the data within the clinical context https://t.co/Oh4AYwUGGY
